title: Job Search Workspace Configuration
description: Configuration file for the job search workspace (.job-search-config.json)

workspace_path.description: Absolute path to the workspace directory

plugin_path.description: Path to the job-search plugin installation

created.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the workspace was created

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last configuration update

profile_type.description: Type of profile created during setup: quick (from resume parsing) or full (via /personal-analysis)

docs_copied.description: Whether plugin documentation has been copied to the workspace

mkdocs_port.description: Default port for the MkDocs documentation server

version.description: Plugin version that created this workspace
